name: Tom’s Surprise
description:
A friend wants to pay a visit to Tom and his family, but when getting there, things go differently...

Tom's Surprise is a small point & click adventure inspired by the Carol Reed adventure game series by MDNA Games (mdna-games.com). Game development started as an experiment during a corona lockdown phase after having played the latest Carol Reed game. This first (German only) version got implemented on Wintermute Engine and was released to family and friends.

After discovering the EgoVenture first person adventure framework by deep Entertainment (deep-entertainment.de) running on Godot platform I've ported and enhanced the game and added English localization.

I hope that you enjoy playing it and have as much fun as I had while creating it.

... and now find out whether you will meet Tom or not :-)
